text: Inga Swenson (December 29, 1932 - July 23, 2023) was an American actress. She was born in Omaha, Nebraska. Biography in Context. Swenson was best known for her roles as Gretchen Kraus in the TV sitcom Benson and as Ingrid Svenson on the TV sitcom Soap, which had the same producers. She also appeared as northern matriarch Maude Hazard in the acclaimed mini-series North and South in 1985 and again in 1986. Swenson died of natural causes on July 23, 2023 in Los Angeles, California at the age of 90. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1932 births Category:2023 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Omaha, Nebraska
title: Inga Swenson
